name: Name
welcome_intro: Welcome to the interactive escape room created by AI.
instructions: During the game, you find your self in a closed and challenging room, and will need to use the items and clues to successfully escape.
The room will be described in detail, and four different action options will be presented.
Each option will lead you to the next stage in the room, which is also created by the AI according to your choice.
You must examine every detail carefully and be careful not to miss important clues to solve the puzzle.
goal_intro: The main goal is to find the most efficient option for escaping the room.
